question: Eastern Dedicated Freight Corridorâ€™s (DFC) new section, which has been recently inaugurated, is funded by which organisation?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi is to virtually inaugurate 351- km-long New Khurja-New Bhaupur section of the Eastern Dedicated Freight Corridor (DFC).
An Operation Control Centre (OCC), which will act as the command centre for the entire DFC will also be inaugurated at Prayagraj in Uttar Pradesh. This section is built at a project cost of Rs 5,750 crore and is funded by the World Bank.
